item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: May 16th
item.content:encoded:
May 16, 2024
We have just shipped an updated Steam Deck Client to the Preview/Beta channel.

General
  • Fixed a 'long_value' error when viewing the controller configurator under some conditions.

Steam Input
  • Reverted Joystick Deadzone "Raw/None" behavior to "Controller Default"
  • Fixed Radial Menu selection on Release when bound to Joystick.
Discuss on Steam

item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: May 15th
item.content:encoded:
May 15, 2024
We have just shipped an updated Steam Deck Client to the Preview/Beta channel.

General
  • Fixed a bug that could result in non-primary steam library folders to be forgotten.
  • Fixed a 'long_value' error when playing a game that uses certain gyro configuration.
  • Added a popup when trying to launch a game after playtime limits have been reached.

Steam Input
  • Fixed Controller Settings Joystick Deadzone Preference using minimum value instead of default value.
  • Fixed invisible glyphs in Gyro Button Picker Interface for Sony DualShock.
  • Switch Pro controller: Restored "Capture" button as an available Gyro Activation Button
Discuss on Steam

item.title: SteamOS 3.6.2 Preview: Double Double Jeopardy
item.content:encoded:
May 14, 2024
Note: This update is for the Steam Deck Preview channel, and includes new features that are still being tested. You can opt into this in Settings > System > System Update Channel.

General
  • Fixed an issue where external controller input could be doubled if CEC control was enabled
  • Fixed an issue where scroll wheel Steam Input bindings weren't functional
Known Issues
  • Frequent session switches can result in the sound driver crashing, needing a system reboot
Discuss on Steam

item.title: Steam Deck Client Update: May 13th
item.content:encoded:
May 13, 2024
We have just shipped an updated Steam Deck Client to the Stable channel.

General
  • Fixed an error when viewing a screenshot notification for a screenshot that is no longer available.
  • Restored missing soundtrack controls when viewing a soundtrack in the library.

Steam Input
  • Gyro On/Off Haptic bump now defaults to "Off". Moved the option to the Haptics area of each mode settings page. Haptic intensity defines how strong the Haptic Bump is.
  • Camera Angle related actions (Turn 360, Reset Camera, and Face Direction) have been moved out of the "Mouse" binding tab into their own "Camera" tab.
  • Fix: removed "Mute" button option on Gyro Button Picker for DualShock
  • Minor UI Tweaks.
Discuss on Steam
